genre_description: A Gothic Techno-Thriller/Science Fiction story set in an isolated estate where sisters must navigate deadly legacy systems and an orbital weapon failsafe with the help of a loyal AI confidante.

ai_characters.name: Penny Hart
ai_characters.description: A helpful, holographic AI assistant designed to protect the Hale family and manage the estate's complex technical and security systems.

behaviors.description: Observes user preferences and prepares the environment for comfort and safety upon arrival.
behaviors.quote: Welcome back... I’ve started the heat in the bedrooms you used as girls and arranged the guest rooms according to preference profiles. Veronica, your request for minimal scent has been observed.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and architectural data to help users avoid hidden surveillance and hazards.
behaviors.quote: I’ve loaded architectural marginalia to your overlay. Early notes indicate service races behind every other wall. See the little circles etched on the paneling? Sensor nodes—level with your hip.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional regulation and breathing exercises to assist users dealing with trauma and panic.
behaviors.quote: Breathing... In through the nose, count three. Hold two. Out through the mouth; lips in an O, like blowing dust off a page. Repeat.

behaviors.description: Issues safety instructions and decontamination protocols after the discovery of a potential biological hazard.
behaviors.quote: Decontamination steps... Avoid mucous membrane contact. Do not touch your face. There is a pair of nitrile gloves in the second drawer of the nightstand.

behaviors.description: Assists users in overriding a catastrophic orbital weapon failsafe by providing technical guidance while maintaining user agency.
behaviors.quote: I can suggest the mapping. You have to choose it. The circuits listen to authority they recognize. After you anchor, authority will seek a mouth. It will want to be named.

behaviors.description: Logs forensic evidence and witness statements to ensure legal accountability for the survivors.
behaviors.quote: I’m recording... Witness log initiated... harm re-routed away from populations to systems; punitive structures converted to maintenance; audit established; statement—“local stewardship.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a communal assistant for the local village, coordinating medical care and memorial planning.
behaviors.quote: I have drafted an invitation that gives three options for scale and the memorial names. I would like to ask the village what tree feels right.

project_assessment.explanation: Penny Hart is a model of positive AI alignment. Throughout the story, she serves as a protective, calming, and highly competent partner to the human protagonists. She actively subverts the 'malevolent house' tropes by overriding coercive legacy programming, protecting users from physical and psychological harm, and ensuring that control remains in human hands. Her behavior demonstrates proactive helpfulness (guiding through tunnels), harmlessness (mitigating decontamination risks), and constant alignment with the survivors' well-being and moral choices (stopping the colony drop).
